txt.en: 'I've been told to keep an eye out for a virtuous man, or woman, elf, hobbit, or dwarf.\n\n'Any will do, just send them my way.'
'It's so nice to meet such a virtuous man.. or woman, elf, hobbit, or dwarf..\n\n'Now go forth and be virtous!'
A Slightly Virtuous Man (or Woman, Elf, Hobbit, Dwarf)
You are slightly virtuous!  Or will be when this quest is done anways.\n\nGood on your parents and all, now go spread your morality.
Talk to Maid of Lions again to get your virtues.
